Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Directs the NYS energy research and development authority to grant minority, women, veteran and disabled owned businesses enhanced priority as certified installers under the sun solar electric incentive
Summary: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to grant minority-, women-, veteran- and disabled-owned businesses enhanced priority as certified installers under the New York sun solar electric incentive program; includes the granting of additional incentives to customers, streamlined certification, unique designations and advance notification of project opportunities.
LawCode: Add ยง1854-e, Pub Auth L; add ยง73, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the public service law, in relation to directing the New York state energy research and development authority to establish and implement regulations authorizing certain certified installers to offer additional incentives under the New York sun solar electric incentive program
